entry.title: New P2P commands for diagnostics, SPV clients
entry.summary: In a thread on the Bitcoin-development mailing list from June 2012, Mike Hearn proposed combining the 'filterinit' and 'filterload' commands in Bitcoin. Simon suggested keeping them separate to allow for new filterloads if the user's list changes without the privacy implications of filteradd. Additionally, Hearn asked for clarification on the format of the 'filterload' and 'filteradd' commands and how they would be received. The discussion also touched on the upcoming Live Security Virtual Conference, which was set to cover topics such as endpoint security, mobile security, and malware threats.
